home.bio: Seasoned Software Engineer with over a decade of expertise in designing and implementing scalable software solutions. Comprehensive knowledge in Java, C++, TypeScript/JavaScript, along with substantial experience with cloud technologies (AWS, Firebase) and modern frameworks (Spring Boot, React, Next.js).

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools in my professional stack

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: Career milestones and areas of responsibility

achievements.api-design: Development and documentation of RESTful APIs for microservice architectures
achievements.technical-projectmanagement: Leading technical teams and coordinating cross-departmental projects
achievements.customer-support: Key account support and technical problem solving in enterprise environments
achievements.se: Implementation of modern software engineering practices and quality assurance
achievements.se-system-architecture: Designing scalable system architectures and infrastructure planning
achievements.fullstack-dev: Development of backend systems and reactive frontend applications
achievements.win-linux-dev: Development of cross-platform applications for Windows and Linux environments
achievements.db-dev: Data modeling and optimization of relational and NoSQL databases
achievements.gui-dev: Development of intuitive user interfaces with modern UI frameworks
achievements.it-management: Optimization of IT processes and introduction of efficient workflows

projects.title: Portfolio Projects
projects.subtitle: Selected highlights from my technical career

iga.title: Identity Governance & Administration (IGA)
iga.description: Enterprise identity management platform with RBAC model and automated workflow engine. Implementation of a scalable microservice architecture with REST APIs, OAuth 2.0, and OIDC integration for single sign-on and federated authentication.

dpa-import.title: Real-time News Import (dpa)
dpa-import.description: High-performance processing system for real-time import of dpa news data. Application of event sourcing and CQRS principles for asynchronous message queues and resilience during peak loads through adaptive scaling.

news-processing.title: Content Management Pipeline
news-processing.description: ETL system for media content with multi-channel publication strategy. Implementation of a data-driven workflow with automated metadata extraction, taxonomy classification, and content API for cross-channel distribution.

autocad-modeling.title: 3D Modeling for Engineering
autocad-modeling.description: Integration of AutoCAD with domain-specific modeling software for bridge and infrastructure projects. Development of custom visualization components using DirectX/OpenGL with a focus on performance for complex 3D models.

distributor.title: Geometric Modeling for Infrastructure Design
distributor.description: Core module for parametric geometry calculations in CAD software for bridge design. Implementation of complex algorithms for spline interpolation, collision detection, and spatial optimization using C++ and GPU acceleration for real-time rendering.

automated-testing.title: Visual Regression Testing Framework
automated-testing.description: Test automation solution for UI-intensive applications with visual difference detection. Integration into DevOps pipelines with automatic error classification, detailed test reports, and support for cross-browser and multi-platform testing.

cicd-web.title: DevOps Pipeline for Micro-Frontends
cicd-web.description: End-to-end CI/CD system for modular web components with automatic versioning and deployment. Implementation of infrastructure as code, continuous quality assurance, and blue-green deployment strategies for zero-downtime updates.

bakkal-usta.title: E-Commerce Platform "Bakkal-Usta"
bakkal-usta.description: Mobile cross-platform application with optimized offline functionality and reactive UI. Implementation of a scalable backend system with GraphQL API, real-time synchronization, and local caching for improved performance under challenging network conditions.
